# Background

<br>

## Experience

**since 2019 \| Data Scientist \@ Health Sciences, Helsana insurance grp.**\
Lead, design and implementation of data analyses for internal projects and scientific studies at the health science department, with a focus on understanding the effectiveness and the quality of treatment in the Swiss health care system. Find all the research group's publications [here](https://www.helsana.ch/de/helsana-gruppe/medien-publikationen/wissenschaftliche-publikationen.html), and my individual publications [here](/publications/index.qmd).

**2017 - 2019 \| Data Scientist \@ Advanced Analytics, Sanitas insurance grp.**\
Lead, design and implementation of advanced analytical projects. In-house consulting and teaching of statistical and analytical skills.

**2012 - 2016 \| projectwise \| Biostatistican \@ University Hospital Zurich, Cantonal Hospital Aarau**\
Design, implementation of and consulting on statistics and data analyses for clinical trials/ scientific publications.

<hr>

**2017 \| PhD in Evolutionary Biology**\
Anthropological Institute and Museum, University of Zurich.\

Epidemiology, Biostatistics and Prevention Institute, University of Zurich.\
[Thesis](files/Msc_Thesis_Biostats.pdf): Phylogenetic comparative methods for discrete responses in evolutionary biology.

Anthropological Institute and Museum, University of Zurich.
